sources.data_found: GPU node counts and GPUs-per-node: H200 nodes: nfh (6 nodes, 4x H200 each) and neh (2 nodes, 8x H200 each); L40S nodes: nel (3 nodes, 8x L40S each); A100 SXM nodes: nal (11 nodes, 4x A100 80GB each); A100 PCIe nodes: nif (6 nodes, 4x A100 40GB each); V100s nodes: nvf (20+1 nodes, 4x V100s each); V100 nodes: nvl (8 nodes, 8x V100 each).
GPU model mapping and memory: H200 (141GB, SXM), L40S (48GB, PCIe), A100 SXM (80GB), A100 PCIe (40GB), V100/V100s (32GB).
Grace Hopper node listing: 3 nodes (nch-[000-002]) each with 1x GH200 96GB, plus 1 node (nch-003) with 1x GH200 96GB (total 4 GH200 GPUs).
Data Machine overview indicates 4 GPU nodes each with 4x NVIDIA A100 80GB (these appear to be part of the A100 SXM nodes listed under amd21/nal in Cluster Resources).

student_data.notes: MSU College of Engineering → Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) ‘About’ page lists: Undergraduate Students (Fall 2024) = 2,352 and Graduate Students (Fall 2024) = 236. The page does NOT break the 236 graduate students into M.S.-only vs Ph.D.-only counts, so grad_cs_count and phd_cs_count are set to 0 to avoid guessing. No explicit 'last updated' date was visible on the page. ([engineering.msu.edu](https://engineering.msu.edu/about/departments/cse/about))  (Related cross-check: the College of Engineering 'Enrollment Data' page lists Computer Science B.S. undergraduate enrollment for Fall 2024 = 1,965, which is program-specific and therefore differs from the CSE department-wide undergraduate total above.) ([engineering.msu.edu](https://engineering.msu.edu/academics/undergraduate-studies/enrollment-data))

gpu_resources.notes:
Per-cluster GPU totals (nodes × GPUs_per_node):
- H200: nfh = 6×4=24; neh = 2×8=16; H200 total=40
- L40S: nel = 3×8=24; L40S total=24
- A100 80GB (SXM): nal = 11×4=44; A100_80GB total=44
- A100 40GB (PCIe): nif = 6×4=24; A100_40GB total=24
- V100 family: nvf (V100s) = (20+1)×4=84; nvl (V100) = 8×8=64; V100 total=148
- No H100, P100, A6000, A40 found in the current MSU ICER/HPCC cluster resource tables referenced above; those are set to 0.

analysis_notes: Data collected via multi-query approach: separate student and GPU searches.
